subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Bobsledding
Freestyle Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won a World Cup giant slalom in Are, Sweden, on Saturday for her fourth straight victory, while Mikaela Shiffrin, another American, missed the race after a crash in warmups.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won a World Cup giant slalom in Are, Sweden, on Saturday for her fourth straight victory, while Mikaela Shiffrin, another American, missed the race after a crash in warmups.
